short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension supports displaying the gif image when load a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension was developed by Tuan Nguyen, who is a software engineer.

The Display Gif Image Extension doesn't show ads and doesn't send users' data anywhere. It's fully open-source: https://github.com/nguyenvantuan2391996/extensions-development/tree/master/display-gif-image-extension

Before you install it, disable similar extensions. Enjoy watching!

Contact me at: nguyenvantuan2391996@gmail.com

Version 1.0.0: release version 1.0.0
